name: Magento Page Builder
short_description:
Main Features:

Intuitive Interface: Ves Page Builder offer user friendly and easy to use admin panel. This is very visual, no technical knowledge or code line needed.
Fully Responsive: All screen sizes and mobile devices are supported.Based on bootstrap 3 Grid System
Drag & Drop MANAGEMENT: Create your desired cms page with just little simple drag & drop steps.
Support parallax background for row or column in cms page.
Work with any custom themes.
50+ Widgets: Add advanced and convenient elements without limitation into your cms pages or blocks in the site, such as: Content Tab, Accordion, Video, Social Widget, Pricing Table, Progress Bar,...We will update more widgets for the pages builder extension.
Magento Widget Support: With this function, you can directly add widgets into a page and configure them or use any 3rd party widgets.
Easy Customization: We provide you with tons of customization for your cms page, bootstrap 3 css class or external css class, padding, margin, ba
summary: create complex layouts within minutes without touching any single code
